alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sedgwick County through 145 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garden Plain, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Goddard, Maize, Cheney, Colwich, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita, Andale, Bentley, Viola, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport and Lake Afton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 2 and 7. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 46 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
